T02D3109:205a-0: @205a * // gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo la bstod pa //
T02D3109:205a-1: srid gsum ston pa lha yi lha //
T02D3109:205a-2: mtshungs med bde gshegs sh'a kya seng ge yi //
T02D3109:205a-3: mthon mthing g-yas su 'khyil ba'i spyi gtsug nas //
T02D3109:205a-4: ya mtshan rmad byung lha mo khro rgyal gtso //
T02D3109:205a-5: khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra'i mgon med de //
T02D3109:205a-6: thugs rje'i dbang phyug bkra shis mchog gi lha //
T02D3109:205a-7: sku mdog gangs ri'i rtse la nyi shar 'dra //
T02D3109:205a-8: zhal mang stong la spyan mang bye ba brgya //
T02D3109:205a-9: srid pa'i btson rar sems can nyam thag pa //
T02D3109:205a-10: dus gsum gzigs nas sems can grol mdzad de //
T02D3109:205a-11: zhal stong phyag stong spyan stong rnams kyis ni //
T02D3109:205a-12: kun la khyab mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3109:205a-13: bdud dang bgegs rigs pas kyi rgol ba rnams //
T02D3109:205a-14: spyan mang gzigs pas khro gnyar 'ga' ston pas //
T02D3109:205a-15: gnod pa'i rgyun rnams gtan nas 'joms mdzad pa //
T02D3109:205a-16: rgol ba tshar gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3109:205a-17: ma rig nor bas bslus pa'i sems can rnams //
T02D3109:205a-18: rang gi las nyid rnam par smin pa yi //
T02D3109:205a-19: 'du ba rnam bzhi'i ri mas nad mi bzad pa //
T02D3109:205a-20: zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D3109:205a-21: ji ltar khyod kyis sems can mang po la //
T02D3109:205a-22: thugs rje mchog gis 'gro don nyer bzung nas //
T02D3109:205a-23: srid gsum 'jigs pa che las bsgral gyur cing //
T02D3109:205a-24: sdug bsngal mang po'i nad las thar mdzad ltar //
T02D3109:205a-25: bdag kyang khyod bzhin 'gro ba'i mgon gyur te //
T02D3109:205a-26: sems can klu yi zhags pas zin pa dang //
T02D3109:205a-27: nad kyi bskal pas nyen pa'i sems can la //
